mapper.select: select comment.*, from_user.name as from_user_name, from_user.email as from_user_email, from_user.homepage as from_user_homepage, from_user.avatar as from_user_avatar, to_user.name as to_user_name, to_user.email as to_user_email, to_user.homepage as to_user_homepage, to_user.avatar as to_user_avatar from site_comment comment left join site_user from_user on comment.from_user_id = from_user.id left join site_user to_user on comment.to_user_id = to_user.id where comment.page_id = #{pageId} order by comment.create_date
select count(*) from site_comment where page_id = #{pageId}
mapper.insert: insert into site_comment (page_id, from_user_id, to_user_id, content, create_date, client_ip) values (#{pageId}, #{fromUser.id}, #{toUser.id}, #{content}, #{createDate}, #{clientIp})
